metadata.title: CVE-2024-39331 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Emacs before 29.4, org-link-expand-abbrev in lisp/ol.el expands a %(...)link abbrev even when it specifies an unsafe function, such asshell-command-to-string. This affects Org Mode before 9.7.5.

criterions.comment: xemacs21 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
xemacs21-packages package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
emacs24 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
org-mode package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
